TopicTitle: KSP Crashing in the loading screen

Articles.Content:
Hey guys! After update the Kerbal, I just can't play anymore, because in the loading screen the unit crash, but the log file is empty!

So anybody can help me?

This is the log file:

[LOG 16:55:28.650] ******* Log Initiated for Kerbal Space Program - 1.9.0.2781 (WindowsPlayer x64) pt-br *******
Kerbal Space Program - 1.9.0.2781 (WindowsPlayer x64) pt-br


OS: Windows 10  (10.0.0) 64bit
CPU: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-7200U CPU @ 2.50GHz (4)
RAM: 8090
GPU: Intel(R) HD Graphics 620 (2150MB)
SM: 50 (Direct3D 11.0 [level 11.1])
RT Formats: ARGB32, Depth, ARGBHalf, Shadowmap, RGB565, ARGB4444, ARGB1555, Default, ARGB2101010, DefaultHDR, ARGB64, ARGBFloat, RGFloat, RGHalf, RFloat, RHalf, R8, ARGBInt, RGInt, RInt, BGRA32, RGB111110Float, RG32, RGBAUShort, RG16, BGRA10101010_XR, BGR101010_XR, R16


Log started: Sat, Feb 15, 2020 16:55:28

This is the print of the error:

 

I try a fresh install, I deleted all pastes of the game, including the appdata pastes, but this doesnt works...

 

Edited February 15, 2020 by Kilof

I tried -force-d3d12 and was able to get the game loaded. OpenGL and DX11 both resulted in crashes for me.

 

DirectX 12 might not be supported.
